name: Miner (itch) (shortround)
description:
This is a small demo of a 2D mining game. The caverns are procedurally generated using cellular automata, and you can mine the walls. Currently, you can't pick up any rocks or anything, all you can do is walk around and break walls.

There are rocks, iron ore, and tin ore to mine. The world is 512x512 tiles, and you can't go outside the grid yet. In the future, more chunks will be generated when you get to the edge
